about_the_game:
We Are All Thats Left

Humanity is fighting for survival against the wraiths that now reign dominant in the world. Thankfully, technology is on our side. Fight your way through hordes of enemies while completing objectives to further mankind's struggle to survive.

Survive The Horde

Embark on procedurally generated missions to push back the threat of the Wraiths. Progressing through a mission grants randomized modifiers for both you and your enemies. The longer you survive, the crazier the powers get, keeping each run fresh and unique.

Craft Your Knight

Create your own class by equipping gear mods for your various weapons and armor to enhance your preferred playstyle. As one of the prestigious knights protecting humanity, you have access to the most technologically advanced equipment available.

Play Solo Or Coop

Run missions by yourself, or bring up to 2 friends to fight alongside you against the never ending hordes of enemies in your way.

The Demo

The Knights Within Demo contains all of the game play and combat from the full game with a few limitations:
  • Only 1 map/biome
  • Limited progression

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: DLSS and NIS upscaling are available
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Further detailed requirements TBD

short_description: Knights Within is a 1-3 player blend between third person shooter and melee hack&slash with roguelite elements. Design custom loadouts, navigate procedurally generated levels and utilize random power-ups. Can you survive endless waves of enemies to ensure humanity's survival?
